item.title: Development Tools
item.description: Linting See also: lint Development server ðŸ’¡ Get your local IP address by running netstat -r from the command line. Your IP address will be in the first (Destination) column. Doks makes the Hugo development webserver accessible by default at http://localhost:1313 and http://<local-ip-address>:1313. The latter is handy for e.g. testing locally on mobile devices. Saved changes will live reload in the browser. Netlify DEV Doks’ ./netlify.toml excerpt:

item.title: FlexSearch
item.description: Language settings Insert after line 82 in ./assets/js/index.js the language specific settings, like so: .. var index = new FlexSearch({ preset: 'score', cache: true, doc: { id: 'id', field: [ 'title', 'description', 'content', ], store: [ 'href', 'title', 'description', ], }, // Insert language specific settings below â€” e.g. Latin encode: "simple", tokenize: "forward" }); .. Latin .. encode: "simple", tokenize: "forward" .. Arabic .. encode: false, rtl: true, split: /\s+/, tokenize: "forward" .

item.title: Multilingual Mode
item.description: Demo Available soon Configuration Enable In ./config/_default/params.toml, enable Multilinguage Mode: [options] .. multilingualMode = true .. Set languages In ./config/_default/config.toml, set languages: # Multilingual defaultContentLanguage = "en" disableLanguages = ["de", "nl"] # defaultContentLanguageInSubdir = true Set language settings In ./config/_default/languages.toml, set language settings (for each language): [en] languageName = "English" contentDir = "content/en" weight = 10 [en.params] languageISO = "EN" [de] languageName = "German" contentDir = "content/de" weight = 15 [de.
